sn7.1:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava rajagahe viharati veluvane kalandakanivape.
sn7.1:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena annatarassa bharadvajagottassa brahmanassa dhananjani nama brahmani abhippasanna hoti buddhe ca dhamme ca sanghe ca.
sn7.1:1.4: Atha kho dhananjani brahmani bharadvajagottassa brahmanassa bhattam upasamharanti upakkhalitva tikkhattum udanam udanesi:
sn7.1:5.1: Evam vutte, bharadvajagotto brahmano dhananjanim brahmanim etadavoca:
sn7.1:5.2: “evamevam panayam vasali yasmim va tasmim va tassa mundakassa samanassa vannam bhasati.
sn7.1:5.3: Idani tyaham, vasali, tassa satthuno vadam aropessami”ti.
sn7.1:5.4: “Na khvaham tam, brahmana, passami sadevake loke samarake sabrahmake sassamanabrahmaniya pajaya sadevamanussaya, yo tassa bhagavato vadam aropeyya arahato sammasambuddhassa.
sn7.1:5.5: Api ca tvam, brahmana, gaccha, gantva vijanissasi”ti.
sn7.1:6.1: Atha kho bharadvajagotto brahmano kupito anattamano yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavata saddhim sammodi.
sn7.1:6.2: Sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidi.
sn7.1:6.3: Ekamantam nisinno kho bharadvajagotto brahmano bhagavantam gathaya ajjhabhasi:
sn7.1:9.1: Evam vutte, bharadvajagotto brahmano bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn7.1:9.3: Seyyathapi, bho gotama, nikkujjitam va ukkujjeyya, paticchannam va vivareyya, mulhassa va maggam acikkheyya, andhakare va telapajjotam dhareyya: ‘cakkhumanto rupani dakkhanti’ti; evamevam bhota gotamena anekapariyayena dhammo pakasito.
sn7.1:9.4: Esaham, bhante, bhagavantam gotamam saranam gacchami dhammanca bhikkhusanghanca.
sn7.1:9.5: Labheyyaham bhoto gotamassa santike pabbajjam, labheyyam upasampadan”ti.
sn7.1:10.1: Alattha kho bharadvajagotto brahmano bhagavato santike pabbajjam, alattha upasampadam.
sn7.1:10.2: Acirupasampanno kho panayasma bharadvajo eko vupakattho appamatto atapi pahitatto viharanto nacirasseva—yassatthaya kulaputta sammadeva agarasma anagariyam pabbajanti tadanuttaram—brahmacariyapariyosanam dittheva dhamme sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja vihasi.
sn7.1:10.3: “Khina jati, vusitam brahmacariyam, katam karaniyam, naparam itthattaya”ti abbhannasi.
sn7.1:10.4: Annataro ca panayasma bharadvajo arahatam ahositi.
